title: Stylish China Escape Overlooking Yangtze River and East China Sea
description: Between the mighty Yangtze River and the shimmering East China Sea, Crowne Plaza Qidong, an IHG Hotel, offers guests unrivalled access to one of China’s most beguiling cities, just 60 minutes from bustling Shanghai. Discover a region steeped in antiquity - allegedly favoured by legendary Taoist immortal Lu Dongbin - and return to elegant Shanghai-style plates at Cai Feng Lou and lazy laps in the hotel’s hidden grove-like pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Qidong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 377 Linyang South Road, Huilong Town, Qidong 226200, Mainland China
